description: Fired when a clothing item is successfully unequipped from an entity

entityId.description: The entity that unequipped the clothing

clothingItemId.description: The clothing item entity ID that was unequipped

slotId.description: The equipment slot the item was unequipped from

layer.description: The layer the item was unequipped from

reason.description: The reason the item was unequipped

cascadeCount.description: Number of additional items unequipped due to layer dependencies

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when the item was unequipped
